summary: A news interview showcasing the progress of Cashaa, a blockchain-based financial services company, featuring the founder and CEO, Kumar Gaurav.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a dynamic graphic displaying the text "KCN NEWS KOLES COIN" against a futuristic blue and white background, featuring a globe and digital elements. The scene transitions to a news studio where Katherine Bratchina, dressed in a white blouse, presents news with a cityscape visible through large windows behind her. The studio is modern, with a sleek design and a blue color scheme. Katherine's name and title appear on the screen, along with logos for "PARTNER USAT" and "KCN worldwide." The video then shifts to a graphic with the text "KCN INTERVIEWS GENERAL PARTNER USAT," followed by a segment featuring a screen displaying the logo and tagline of "cashaa," described as "The Next Generation Banking Platform For The Next Billion." The text "NEWSHEET KUMAR GAURAV, THE FOUNDER & SUBSCRIBE" appears at the top, and the "cashaa PARTNER" logo is visible on the right. The scene transitions to an image of a laptop with the "cashaa" logo, surrounded by floating dollar bills, with the text "$33 million" displayed prominently. The video concludes with a graphic showing a red "REJECTED" stamp over a white background, accompanied by the text "NEWSUNDER & CEO OF CASHAA HOLDINGS / SUBSCRIBE" at the top and the "cashaa PARTNER" logo on the right. The overall atmosphere is professional and informative, with a focus on financial news and partnerships.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with upbeat, electronic music with a fast tempo, creating an energetic mood. A female speaker then introduces a news segment on blockchain solutions in banking. The speaker is followed by a male speaker named Kumar Gurav. The clip transitions to a description of Mr. Gurav's achievements with a focus on Casha Holdings and their token sale in 2017. The background music remains consistent throughout the segment.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a news broadcast featuring a blue and red graphic with the text "PARTNER CASHAA" and "cashaa.com" prominently displayed, along with a logo and a "SUBSCRIBE" button. The scene transitions to a man in a brown leather jacket sitting in front of a red background with the text "KOLES COIN NEWS" repeatedly displayed. The broadcast then shows the United States Capitol building with yellow caution tape in front, accompanied by the text "NEWS TOKEN SALE IN 2017, OUT OF WHICH $14 MILLION WAS REJECTED DUE TO STRICT AML AND KYC POLICY." The video continues with another man in a light blue shirt sitting in front of a red background with the same "KOLES COIN NEWS" text. The next scene features a man in a gray shirt sitting in a modern office environment, with the text "NEWS KYC POLICY SETUP BY CASHAA. KUMAR A SERIAL ENTREPRENEUR WHO IS AMONG THE HUNDRED MILLIONAIRE." The video then shows two men in suits sitting at a table with microphones, with the text "NEWS KYC POLICY SETUP BY CASHAA. KUMAR A SERIAL ENTREPRENEUR WHO IS AMONG THE HUNDRED MILLIONAIRE." The final scene features a man in a suit speaking at a podium with the "cashaa" logo, with the text "NEWS KYC POLICY SETUP BY CASHAA. KUMAR A SERIAL ENTREPRENEUR WHO IS AMONG THE HUNDRED MILLIONAIRE." The video concludes with a close-up of hands working on a computer motherboard, with the text "NEWS KYC POLICY SETUP BY CASHAA. KUMAR A SERIAL ENTREPRENEUR WHO IS AMONG THE HUNDRED MILLIONAIRE." Throughout the video, the "PARTNER cashaa.com" logo and "KCN worldwide" badge are consistently displayed on the right side of the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker discussing Kumar, describing his achievements and accolades in the blockchain industry, mentioning his invitations to speak at various tech events, and concluding with his nomination as a top innovator. The speaker has an informative tone. As she finishes, background music starts; it's an upbeat, electronic style track, creating a futuristic mood with synthetic sounds. Subsequently, the music fades out.

events_list.video_caption:
The video opens with a news anchor, dressed in a white shirt, seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop at night. The anchor is positioned in front of a large window, with the city lights visible behind her. The studio is well-lit, and the anchor appears to be delivering a news report. On the right side of the screen, there is a graphic with the text "USAT PARTNER" and "usat.io," along with a logo featuring a circular design with the letters "KCN" and the word "worldwide." The word "SUBSCRIBE" is displayed in a red box at the top right corner of the screen.

The scene transitions to a close-up of a building with the word "BANK" in large, gold letters on its facade. The camera then shifts to a screen displaying the logo "cashaa" with the tagline "The Next Generation Banking Platform For The Next Billion." The background of the screen is dark blue with a subtle geometric pattern. The same "USAT PARTNER" and "usat.io" graphic is visible on the right side of the screen, along with the "KCN" logo and the word "worldwide." The word "SUBSCRIBE" remains in the red box at the top right corner.

Next, the video shows a large pile of US dollar bills with the text "US$33 million" in gold letters superimposed over the image. The same "USAT PARTNER" and "usat.io" graphic is present on the right side of the screen, along with the "KCN" logo and the word "worldwide." The word "SUBSCRIBE" is still visible in the red box at the top right corner. The scene then transitions to a graphic featuring a globe surrounded by colorful human figures, with the text "53,381 people from 119 countries" displayed prominently. The same "USAT PARTNER" and "usat.io" graphic is visible on the right side of the screen, along with the "KCN" logo and the word "worldwide." The word "SUBSCRIBE" remains in the red box at the top right corner.

The video then shows a blue screen with the text "KCN INTERVIEWS" in large, metallic letters, with "GENERAL PARTNER USAT" displayed below in smaller text. events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a female speaker reading a news release about a cash project, stating that it will change the banking system with blockchain technology and that the project raised $33 million via token sale. She announces that she will interview Kumar Gourav, the founder and CEO of the Casha project and then greets him. Finally, there's a short period of silence. During this time, upbeat, positive electronic music plays in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a split-screen interview between a news anchor and Kumar Gaurav, the CEO of Cashaa Holdings and Chairman of Auxesis Group. The anchor, dressed in a white shirt, is seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop, while Gaurav, wearing a dark patterned shirt, is in a home setting with a framed picture and a television in the background. The news ticker at the top of the screen provides updates on Cashaa's financial achievements, including a $33 million token sale in 2017, with $14 million rejected due to strict AML and KYC policies. The ticker also highlights Gaurav's background as a serial entrepreneur. The video includes logos for USAT Partner and Kcoin, indicating a partnership. The atmosphere is professional, with a focus on delivering financial news and insights.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with two speakers, one female and one male, discussing cash development since the token sale. The woman begins with an inquiry and asks for an estimation of cash's token sale success. The man responds in a relatively calm, informative tone, stating that he considers the token sale successful, particularly due to reaching the hard cap, and expresses his gratitude that the team ensured the money received is fully compliant to avoid regulatory issues. The audio clip ends at that point.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a news segment with Kumar Gaurav, identified as the Founder & CEO of Cashaa, speaking directly to the camera. He is dressed in a dark shirt with a subtle pattern, set against a modern, well-lit room with a white wall and a framed picture in the background. The news ticker at the top of the screen scrolls through various headlines, including mentions of "USAT PARTNER usat.io" and "KCN worldwide," suggesting a focus on cryptocurrency and blockchain topics. Kumar appears engaged and informative, discussing his achievements and the recognition he has received, such as being among the "Hundred Most Influential Blockchain People in the World" and being awarded "Extraordinary Status (O1) by the United States Government." The atmosphere is professional and informative, with the news channel's branding and subscription prompts visible throughout the segment.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker discussing a cap of 32 million dollars being reached, which was more than $33 million dollars, so a success in terms of numbers. Then he mentions KYC, AML policies, and international compliance and how 100 countries are involved, necessitating a vast, diversified framework. He speaks in a conversational and informative tone, and proudly announces that the team rejected around $14.7 million to conclude their token sale.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a split-screen interview between a blonde woman in a white shirt, seated in a news studio with a cityscape backdrop, and a man named Kumar Gaurav, wearing a dark patterned shirt, in a home setting. The woman, identified as a news anchor, engages in conversation with Gaurav, who is a speaker on emerging technologies. The screen displays the text "NEWS TIONAL SPEAKER ON EMERGING TECHNOLOGIES" and "SUBSCRIBE" at the top, along with logos for "USAT PARTNER usat.io" and "KCN worldwide." As the interview progresses, the text updates to "NEWS SPEAKER ON EMERGING TECHNOLOGIES AND WAS INVITED AT IIT, TIECON, TECH," indicating Gaurav's involvement in notable events. The atmosphere is professional, with both participants appearing engaged in the discussion, set against contrasting backgrounds that highlight the interview format.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker stating that on May 12th, "Cache launched their OTC exchange where the buyer can buy and store tokens." Speech is soon cut off.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a split-screen interview between a blonde woman in a white shirt, seated in a news studio with a cityscape backdrop, and a man named Kumar Gaurav, identified as the Founder & CEO of CASHAA, wearing a dark patterned shirt in a well-lit room with a television in the background. The news ticker at the top of the screen highlights Kumar Gaurav's participation in various conferences, including IIT, TIECON, and TechCrunch, and mentions his nomination as one of the world's top 50 innovators. The right side of the screen displays logos for USAT Partner and KCN worldwide, indicating partnerships. The atmosphere is professional, with a focus on Kumar Gaurav's achievements and contributions to the tech industry. The video maintains a consistent visual style, emphasizing the interview format and the importance of the topics discussed.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a question asking, "what OTC is, and how does it work?". A male speaker responds, with a conversational tone, that after the token sale, since Casher is a utility token, there are many users and within the Casher token sale they had more than 40% funds actually in tokens bought in dollars. He emphasizes this point, noting that unlike most token sales, they are using currencies for the purchase.

events_list.video_caption: The video features Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of Cashaa, speaking in a modern, well-lit room with a white wall and a framed picture in the background. Kumar is wearing a dark patterned shirt and appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as indicated by his facial expressions and gestures. The video has a news broadcast style, with a banner at the top displaying the text "NEWS' TOP 50 INNOVATORS FROM THE INDUSTRIES OF THE FUTURE" and a "SUBSCRIBE" button on the right side. Additionally, there are logos for "USAT PARTNER" and "KCN worldwide" on the right side of the screen, suggesting a partnership or sponsorship. The text at the bottom of the screen identifies Kumar Gaurav and his role at Cashaa. Throughout the video, Kumar discusses his background and achievements, including his work in financial technology and his experience building computer systems for Ferrari. The video maintains a professional and informative atmosphere, with Kumar providing insights into his career and the company he leads.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker who expresses that they "had this diversified" number of people who never bought crypto, but they believed in the "cash up project", and believed that it would become important in their lives. He continues to say that it's because of the need to send money, or a problem with banking. He says that users bought tokens with USD. He concludes by stating that he's realized that many users are not ready to "buy on any exchange."

events_list.video_caption: The video features Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of Cashaa, speaking in a well-lit room with a modern interior. He is wearing a dark patterned shirt and appears to be engaged in a discussion about cryptocurrency services. The background includes a framed picture and a white wall, contributing to a professional atmosphere. Throughout the video, on-screen graphics display the text "NEWS: COUNTER OTC EXCHANGE WILL PROVIDE Â£ SUBSCRIBE" and "USAT PARTNER usat.io" alongside a logo, indicating a partnership with USAT. Kumar Gaurav's name and title are consistently shown at the bottom of the screen. The video also mentions the launch of a new service on May 12th, with the text "NEWS: BUY AND STORE TOKENS. ON THE 12TH OF MAY ACCORD" appearing at the top, suggesting an upcoming event or announcement related to token buying and storage. The overall setting and presentation suggest a formal and informative discussion on cryptocurrency-related topics.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip consists primarily of speech. A man speaks, referencing being "listed in top exchanges", but still receiving mail from people wanting to buy tokens directly from the company, because they find it more "legitimate" and "trustworthy." The tone is conversational and informative.

events_list.video_caption: The video features Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of CASHAA, speaking in a news broadcast setting. He is wearing a dark patterned shirt and is situated in a well-lit room with a white wall and a framed picture in the background. The broadcast includes a news ticker at the top with the date "12th of May" and a "SUBSCRIBE" button on the right. Kumar Gaurav is discussing the launch of the CASHAA OTC exchange, highlighting its 0% transaction fee and great user experience. The broadcast also features logos for "USAT PARTNER" and "KCN worldwide" on the right side of the screen. Throughout the video, Kumar Gaurav appears to be actively speaking, with his facial expressions and gestures indicating engagement with the topic. The overall atmosphere is professional and informative, with a focus on the announcement of the new exchange.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker describing a small module of "Kasha OTC" where they collect tokens from exchanges and provide them directly to unsophisticated users for purchasing "cash tokens" as a utility to use the "Kasha application" or ecosystem. A female speaker then introduces the division of the OTC launch into three phases.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a split-screen interview between a news anchor and Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of CASHAA. The anchor, dressed in a white blouse, is seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop, while Kumar Gaurav, wearing a dark patterned shirt, is in a well-lit room with a neutral background. The screen displays various texts, including "Koles Coin News Studio," "Kumar Gaurav," "USAT Partner usat.io," and "KCN worldwide." The news ticker at the top mentions "24/7 Customer Support" and "The Launch of the Exchange," with a "Subscribe" button visible. Kumar Gaurav discusses the launch of the exchange, mentioning its division into three phases to address community challenges. The video maintains a professional and informative atmosphere throughout, with consistent visual elements and a focus on the interview's content.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a conversation between two speakers, a woman and a man. The man explains that in the "cashio ecosystem", there are main two projects: "exchange between crypto to crypto and exchange between fiat to any crypto", followed by their "banking application, where users can store fiat currencies as well as cryptocurrency". The woman then affirms.

events_list.video_caption: The video features Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of CASHAA, speaking in a modern, well-lit room with a minimalist design. He is dressed in a dark, patterned shirt and is positioned in front of a television screen displaying various images, including landscapes and people. The background is simple, with white walls and recessed lighting, creating a professional atmosphere. Throughout the video, Kumar discusses the features and benefits of CASHAA, emphasizing its ease of use and security. On-screen graphics include the text "NEWSACED BY THE COMMUNITY. ON THE FIRST P SUBSCRIBE" and "USAT PARTNER usat.io KCN worldwide," indicating partnerships and encouraging viewers to subscribe. The text scrolls across the top of the screen, providing additional information about the service, such as its similarity to buying Bitcoin from Coinbase and its flat pricing model. Kumar's expressions and gestures suggest he is actively engaging with the audience, explaining the service's advantages and addressing potential concerns about security and third-party exchanges. The video maintains a consistent visual style, with Kumar remaining the focal point against the clean, modern backdrop.
events_list.audio_caption: An adult male voice speaks in a thoughtful tone, discussing merging products into a "cashapp banking application" where "crypto and fiat can live together". He explains the decision to keep two projects separate due to regulatory issues. He outlines one project for storing and spending fiat money, and also storing crypto. The second project, he says, is an exchange where one can convert fiat into crypto. The man concludes by stating, "and that is exchange."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a news broadcast from the "Koles Coin News Studio," where a female news anchor is seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop, wearing a white shirt. The broadcast includes a split-screen interview with Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of Cashaa, who is seen in a home setting wearing a dark patterned shirt. The screen displays various texts, including "USAT Partner usat.io" and "KCN worldwide," indicating partnerships and affiliations. Kumar Gaurav discusses Cashaa's services, which include features like referral bonuses and complete KYC processes for existing users. The broadcast highlights the convenience of using the service without going through the KYC process again and mentions a second phase that will include the KYC process once more. The atmosphere is professional, with a focus on delivering information about Cashaa's services and features. The video concludes with a call to action for viewers to subscribe, as indicated by the "SUBSCRIBE" text on the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip consists of a single male speaker talking about a multi-phase project related to cryptocurrency. His tone is descriptive and informative as he outlines the project's stages. He begins by explaining the exchange product, dividing it into three parts, the first being "just the OTC" for selling crypto tokens, the second involving enabling both sell and buy functions, and the third going beyond OTC to become "complete peer-to-peer". He elaborates, contrasting the need for an intermediary like "cash app" in OTC trades with the ability for users to conduct transactions independently in the third phase.

events_list.video_caption: The video features Kumar Gaurav, the Founder & CEO of Cashaa, speaking in a modern, well-lit room with a minimalist design. He is wearing a dark, patterned sweater and appears engaged in a discussion about cryptocurrency regulations. The background includes a television screen displaying various images, including a person in a suit and a building, possibly related to the topic being discussed. On-screen graphics include a news ticker with text such as "NEWS," "SUBSCRIBE," and "PARTNER USAT usat.io," along with a logo featuring a stylized atom and the text "KCN worldwide." The ticker also mentions the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) and its recent circular prohibiting banks from dealing with firms handling cryptocurrency. Kumar Gaurav's expressions and gestures suggest he is explaining the implications of these regulations. The video maintains a professional and informative atmosphere throughout, with consistent visual elements and a focus on the subject matter.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single male speaker discussing a financial exchange strategy. His tone is informative as he talks about "chicken and egg problem," breaking things into steps, onboarding buyers and sellers, and creating a community product. No music or background noise is present in the audio.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a news broadcast with two individuals, a woman and a man, discussing cryptocurrency-related news. The woman, with blonde hair, is seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop, while the man, identified as Kumar Gaurav, Founder & CEO of Cashaa, is in a home setting. The broadcast includes text overlays such as "Koles Coin News Studio," "Kumar Gaurav," and "USAT Partner usat.io," along with a "KCN worldwide" logo. The discussion revolves around the Cashaa OTC exchange launch and its advisors, with Kumar Gaurav explaining the reasons behind the delay and the comparison of Cashaa with existing products. The atmosphere is professional, with a focus on delivering information about cryptocurrency developments. The video concludes with a call to action for viewers to subscribe.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker mentioning "regulatory approvals" and integration with networks, asking what "token holders must know". A male speaker responds in an informational tone, explaining the regulatory aspects are "more like an internal back-end system", and mostly the "lawyer's job". He specifies lawyers in the UK have started working on it with a predicted timeline of "end of October, November" to have regulatory approvals in place.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a news broadcast with a split-screen format. On the left side, a news anchor is seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop, wearing a white shirt. On the right side, a man named Kumar Gaurav, identified as the Founder & CEO of CASHAA, is seen in a home setting, wearing a dark patterned shirt. The broadcast includes various text overlays, such as "NEWS," "SUBSCRIBE," and "USAT PARTNER usat.io," along with a logo for "KCN worldwide." The news ticker at the bottom of the screen provides updates on topics related to IBM Cloud credits and CASHAA's operations. Kumar Gaurav discusses the company's plans and regulatory clarity, with the background showing a television screen displaying different images. The video maintains a professional and informative atmosphere throughout, with consistent branding and visual elements.
events_list.audio_caption:
Sure, here's a description of the audio clip:

The audio clip starts with a question about adding something about "Kcash development" since the "token sale". A male speaker replies, giving details about the effort in "regulatory and compliance" and "returning money". He adds that the product side has onboarded "very good people" who have built a "fantastic product". He mentions people from "Axis Bank", "ICICI Bank" "Barclays" and "HSBC" have come to create "the next banking solution", having "great experience of working". He then states that "they also understand what are the problems in these big banks and how we can as a come as a team and solve this problem".

events_list.video_caption: The video features a news broadcast with a split-screen format. On the left side, a news presenter with blonde hair, dressed in a white blouse, is seated in a studio with a cityscape backdrop visible through large windows. The studio is modern, with a sleek design and blue lighting accents. On the right side, a man with short dark hair, wearing a dark patterned shirt, is seen in a home setting with a television and a framed picture in the background. The text overlay identifies him as 'KUMAR GAURAV, FOUNDER & CEO of CASHAA.' The broadcast includes various text elements, such as 'USAT PARTNER usat.io' and 'KCN worldwide,' indicating partnerships and affiliations. The news ticker at the top of the screen provides updates on regulatory clarity and the launch of new features for CASHAA. The video transitions between close-ups of the presenter and the CEO, with the latter appearing in different settings, including a split-screen format with the presenter. The overall atmosphere is professional, with a focus on delivering news and updates related to CASHAA and its developments.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker discussing the growth of his team, mentioning they have 28 people and plan to expand to 49 by June to deliver a solution. A female speaker then thanks the man for his time, expressing confidence that his work will bring worldwide banking more transparency and trust. The male speaker responds with gratitude. The female speaker then announces the man's name, Kumar Gorav, founder, and CEO of Casha, then ends by telling the listener to stay with them, followed by modern-style music, featuring synth effects and a light-hearted tone.
